summary: cumulative issue progress is calculated wrong
description: when calculating cumulative progress for we shouldn't take into account it's own progress if issue hasn't estimated

summary: move jwt shared secret key to table
description: it seems that shared secret isn't generated per instance but per each plugin therefore it's not currently possible to have two plugin's running on our backend

summary: due date exceeded warning fired to early
description: when the due date is set to next day after calculated task's end date the exclamation mark informing that due date will be exceeded is rendered on the chart
i shouldn't be as the task will be finished just on time

summary: check the license for exported chart
description: exported charts shouldn't be visible when the license is missing or inactive

summary: chart date range calculation ignores due dates
description: by default chart's end date is set to the calculated latest issue's end date days but the algorithm ignores the due dates that can be set far above these dates

summary: store all user's choices on chart's ui
description: all ui buttons states toggles and selected/unseleted projests schould be kept in user's settings and restored on every page

summary: adjust chart's end date
description: it's currently fixed to the end of year
should be calculated based on last issue end date

summary: set the default chart's start date based on issue's creation dates
description: calculate the chart's start date which should be equal to the most earlier issue's creation date from all issues currently visible

summary: create user's context on plugin installation
description: we need to keep user's application context in database

summary: fix rendering issues with more blockers
description: when issue has more than one blocker it's not getting rendered properly

summary: enable js error logging
description: we need to track all js client's errors using the similar mechanism that is now in place for gantt cloud

summary: don't render sprints and versions if there is no issues assigned to them
description: that's how it worked before and it might be confusing now when we just render everything even though most of the issues has been filtered out

summary: allow user to link gantt charts with jira issue filters
description: as a user instead of defining all filters manually on gantt charts page i'd like to link my chart with existing jira issue filter

summary: authenticete as current user while talking to jira api
description: we need to investigate whether it's possible not to use system user while talking to jira backend and use current user instead
therefore all user's permissions and access rights would apply

summary: cannot read property gettime of undefined
description: typeerror cannot read property gettime of undefined typeerror undefined is not an object evaluating newdate.gettime

summary: issue dialog no longer works on exported charts
description: uncaught referenceerror ap is not defined this is due to links types we now trying to fetch from backend
we shouldn't be doing this on exported chart page

summary: add warning icon to the issue bar when due date is violated
description: it would be nice if a violation of the due date would show in the chart itself
that way user don't have to check the issue dialog and there is less chance you miss that

summary: box shadow too intense for some issues
description: i'm not quite sure why but sometimes the box shadow for hovered issues is too intense instead of it usually happens for linked issues with slack time periods in between

summary: link the plugin's start date with jira
description: as an admin i'd like to have the choice whether i wan't to store an issue's start dates internally within the gantt ondemand plugin only or use another field from jira instead
it should be possible to pick an existing field or create a new custom field for that purpose

summary: allow filtering by sprint
description: when jira agile(greenhopper is enabled we should allow filtering issues by the sprint

summary: store filters settings separate from the user to make them shareable
description: filters should be stored separate from the user object with it's own id name visibility settings etc
this way we could make them accessible for different users from the same jira instance

summary: update chart's date range when filters are active
description: issues filtered out and invisible on chart are still taken into account when calculating chart's date range
this should be changed chart area should cover the visible tasks only

summary: create connect issue collector
description: allow users to report issues via standard jira issue collector
replace direct link to support system by the collector's form

summary: circular dependency recognition doesn't always work
description: uncaught rangeerror maximum call stack size exceeded too much recursion i can reproduce by linking to story from task that depends on story's subtasks

summary: some linking arrows are missing when filtering is active
description: links between filtered but not hidden and not filtered issues are missing
see an example with status:competed filter active

summary: linking cause rendering failure
description: we use project.getissue method to find parents linked issues etc
therefore in case of any issue connected with other issue from different project an epic rendering fails
as gantt chart rendering isn't supported yet anyway we should just prevent error from happening

summary: show version's time constraints on chart
description: once we get the version filtering done it will be nice to have the version start and release dates visible on chart area as vertical bars with height equal to all project's issues height combined

summary: display year along with month for past or future years
description: it's ok for current year to show only month names
however when chart area covers more years it's easy to get confused
therefore the past or future years should be displayed along with month names

summary: link not visible for users
description: only admins can actually see the plugin link in project menu as it's invisible for others need to find better section name with web fragment finder

summary: create config dialog
description: create dialog which will allow changing plugin's configuration working hours per day

summary: parent task and subtask start date calculations
description: if has no fixed start date it should be automaticaly set to parent's one
if parent story issue has no fixed start date it should be adjusted to earliest start date

summary: compatibility check
description: make sure the plugin works fine on different platforms/browsers mac os x safari firefox chrome windows firefox chrome mobile iphone safari android tablet samsung galaxy

summary: add a button in the notifications to post a comment
description: this has been suggested by one of our customers
official bitbucket and confluence integrations have this button
please see zendesk support tab for further comments and attachments

summary: implement filtering logic
description: it should be triggered for every channellink whenever issue notification is received from jira

summary: detecting revoked auth tokens
description: in case slack api access token is no longer active and we get error response during any frontend calls or account_inactive we should remove such token on our side as well so the user will no longer appear on the connected users list on slack connector setup page
we should also check if revoked token has been used as default token and remove it as well
in such case the confugure procedure needs to be

summary: implement logic for choosing the right channel and token for notifications
description: when for given issue custom channel is defined use that channel for any notifications with token of the users who added the link when no issue link is present check if there is default channel set for the project and use that channel and token of the link creator when there is no issue and project link defined use global channel for communication when possible

summary: project configuration page
description: this page will be accessible for project admins under project administration page

it should have the following features ability to define default channel where all notifications from given project should be sent to with checkbox to this feature list of all issues from this project with custom channels defined channellinks with ability to remove such link

summary: custom due date field has no effect
description: choosing custom due date field has no effect on the chart
it has been reported by the customer and confirmed on dev

summary: reserved jql words causing errors when used as keys by project filter
description: we should either use project keys always in quotes fastest way or do so only for these who are actually reserved words more

summary: hitting enter key in advanced filtering mode cause error
description: we get jwt authentication failed error which is confusing instead apply button should be triggered

summary: assignee filter does not work for some user names
description: need more investigation but i suspect it might not work properly for names having more than one separate parts

summary: show no estimate warning when using end date
description: when this mode is selected use due dates as end dates skip duration calculation we be warning users about missing time estimates

summary: start date setting does not work for weeks and months scale
description: it works for days scale though

summary: allow users to switch between and gantt cloud version
description: all new instances should be on version by default all existing instances should remain on but notification should be provided about migration possible migration should be reversible at any moment via settings

summary: dependencies rendered incorrectly when custom link type selected
description: when selecting link type other than by dependencies are rendered incorrectly that is some by links are still present on the charts while the others new custom one are missing

summary: create a filter for current project for new instances
description: we should limit the amount of data that gantt cloud is trying to get from jira on first install before the user get the chance to create their own filters or hide some projects in settings

this is causing problems on large instances with lots of projects/issues the idea is to create an example filter for each new installation new user access that will limit the amount of data to current project only jql

summary: a value with id xxxx does not exist for the field project
description: the following jql error is returned whenever someone has the project on the list of hidden projects in gantt cloud settings that has already been archived in jira
when generating jql that exclude hidden projects we should check first whether they still exists on the list of available projects fetched from jira api

summary: issue sumary wraps to new line for some browsers
description: in some cases the issue summary on left sidebar wraps to new line and disappears due to the fixed row height there
it is likely happens under some browsers chrome with changed font scale size
this should be fixed

summary: change working hours range from to hours
description: there is no way currently in settings dialog to set the working hours to more than we should change that to allow full hours coverage

summary: uncaught typeerror cannot read property format of undefined
description: uncaught typeerror cannot read property format of undefined possible scenarion to reproduce start dates kept in jira custom field trying to remove start date for the issue

summary: whenever i run the i eventually get an
description: whenever i run the i eventually get an error message uncaught rangeerror invalid string length is now unusable it previously worked slowly
if not fixed we will uninstall and cancel subscription
please investigate and advise

summary: hide empty projects in left header
description: when there is no issues to render for given project for example due to active filters project name should be removed from the left header

summary: add weeks and months timescale for charts
description: for projects that lasts for long time it will be more convenient for viewers to change the timescale from current to and

summary: html export for gantt goes to internal
description: html export for gantt goes to internal server error reporter matteo

summary: empty jql string causing infinite update loop
description: not sure yet how to reproduce that
the problem has been notified for active filters that have empty jql string
once such filter is set chart module keeps requesting backend for updated data but does not update current jql properly
need to be fixed asap

summary: some issues with start dates set in coming december are rendered in the past february
description: the problem has been indentified for but also reported by the user via atlassian answers site

summary: add visual distinction between parent tasks and subtasks
description: make parent task names on the left sidebar to be formatted as bold and indented if they are a child task

summary: uncheck all projects on first run
description: when user is running the plugin for the first time no projects should be selected by default
that will improve performance and first experience on the instances when there is a lot of projects/issues and rendering process takes to long

summary: the gantt chart is no longer working
an error
description: the gantt chart is no longer working
an error occured whilte contacting with jira api

summary: i tried to select the versions i want to filter
description: i tried to select the versions i want to filter my gantt chart with and i ended up at with the error page

summary: all subtasks should be rendered right after their parent if no other dependencies are present
description: at the moment when the subtask is added and the default sorting order is creation date ascending new subtasks can be splitted by another issues that doesn't belong to the and rendered at the very bottom might be worth implementing in connection to

summary: defining custom days
description: users should be able to configure their own days such as national holidays such days should be treated in the same way as weekends when chart is being rendered

summary: add sprints to the issue dialog
description: whenever issue is a part of the sprint we should show that info on the issue dialog in the same manner as components and versions

summary: allow filtering by label
description: add yet another filter label

summary: add ability to choose from available filters
description: once filters setting will be stored on own the user should be able to pick one and make it active the choice should be made from all own filters and those shared by others

summary: ability to change by link type id
description: it appears that on some jira instances issue link types have different and therefore creating dependencies for gantt purposes work
we should either allow user to setup correct link id in the configuration some sort of advanced options or detect that id or maybe just skip the id and use the name instead

summary: issue dialog not visible when tasks spanned for longer time periods
description: when clicking on wide tasks issue dialog sometimes can be opened outside of visible area which might be confusing for the users
ideally it should be opened always near the mouse pointer

summary: for due date as planned task's end date
description: as an admin like to have an option for skipping the task duration calculations based on estimates and just simply use due date as planned task end date
that choice could be changed at any time via configuration
when will be implemented due date here should be replaced by chosen date

summary: show sprint's time constraints on chart
description: similar to we should also render agile sprints

summary: active filters inactive until refresh on page open
description: when opening gantt charts page some filters restored until refresh button is clicked
i believe filters that are working fine are project component and version the old

summary: cumulative progress higher than
description: see mobileworks project issues

summary: export rendered chart to pdf
description: there should be an option for exporting the rendered chart for selected filter into downloadable pdf file

summary: nesting doesn't always work
description: there is a case reported when stories properly nested for the epics
after a quick check the is indeed a null value for all issues from this instance
we need to investigate it further to check whether it is a bug on the processing side or some other jira edge case scenario
assistance from the customer will be required
see

summary: time zone affects start and due dates
description: there are several reports by now about these dates being shifted by one day which is likely due to the different time zone settings on the client's machine
need to investigate and fix it el pronto

summary: update chart on start date change without backend interaction
description: when start date is changed we can just update affected issue and rendering process without waiting for backend response
this will improve overall chart responsiveness

summary: make component version filter to work for more than one project
description: component and version filter can now work in the same way as status and type that is they should be populated during issue without a need to separate call

summary: allow to remove existing links
description: this should be an easy one as it require any extra frontend just remove icon next to each link
handle permission errors etc

summary: allow filtering by issue type
description: add another filter type

summary: allow filtering issues by assignee
description: add another filter assignee the tricky part will be to fill in the values during issue processing

summary: allow defining custom jql filters in configuration
description: any user should have the ability to define it's own jql query to be performed when fetching issues from jira api
that way a filtering would be possible regardless of frontend filtering along with changing the order etc
this jql query string should be stored on per user basis same as ui state and not per instance

summary: no issue object present when creating observableissue
description: uncaught typeerror cannot read property id of null

summary: timecalculator undefined under some circumstances
description: uncaught typeerror cannot call method calculateissueenddate of undefined

summary: link new documentation from plugin's website
description: should be redirected to confluence pages

summary: prepare documentation skeleton in confluence
description: make a stubs for all create toc etc

summary: create new screenshots
description: current screenshots on marketplace are no longer up to date
create new ones and replace them

summary: create demonstration video
description: make a short movie presenting plugin capabilities post it on youtube and add link to marketplace assets

summary: store settings per user not the instance
description: as plugin is now accessible for all users with browse projects permission settings related to ui state toggles and filters should be kept for each user individually
this will require refactoring on backend side only

summary: report backend jira api errors back to the user
description: in most cases we know exactly what happen when call to jira rest api fails

however the only information shown on the frontend to the user is something like internal server error we should catch communication errors on backend and send some more usable information back to frontend chart module

summary: remove projects from jql query string
description: there is an issue with jira rest api so the list of projects fetched from resource always accessible and making a call to with these ids in jql string triggers an error like this errormessages a value with id xxxx does not exist for the field errors we use jql to limit the number of projects being fetched from jira by removing archived projects therefore we need a mechanism to remove such broken projests from jql either by making another check for accessible projects see api docs for possible options or when error occurs run another search call with all these reported ids removed

summary: use real transitions in status filter
description: when there's only one project selected we should allow filteringy by real statuses determined by assigned workflows insted of generic ones not for more projects we should either fallback to generic ones or merge all statuses from selected projects together consider performace first

summary: allow filtering by status
description: we got components and versions now we need to filter by status open issues that have any progress recorded and closed in progress issues with some progress not done closed issues with hasresolution true

summary: use post method for action
description: after implementing filters the amount of data sending back to backend is growing fast
therefore we should be doing this with post method instead of get

summary: limit the number of projects fetched from jira archive option
description: despite all improvements regarding and still a high possibility that for some instances with many issues and projects we will run out of resources on backend to process them all
also having many issues to render will hit the rendering performance too
therefore we need a way to limit the number of projects that are fetched from jira anyway

user should be able to decide which project is interested in and mark others as archived this option should be accessible from settings dialog at anytime however if system will discover that number of issues is too high lets say archiving old projects will become compulsory on the first run

summary: gantt chart hangs on loading
description: click on projects and gantt chart and the screen hangs
there is nothing populated in the project

summary: better recognition of closed tasks
description: at the moment we assume tasks as done when they have resolution field set or when status.id is set to some given value
apparently not enough
there are many different workflows around so we have to do more than that
there should be a way to get all workflows and then let users to choose in configuration panel which statuses should be considered as etc

summary: migrate xml descriptor file into json
description: see

summary: replace oauth with jwt
description: see

summary: duplicate link handled correctly
description: some isuess links duplicates duplicate by but more likely others too are treated as by and used to render dependencies on the chart
this has to be fixed

summary: mark completed issues on epic's dialog
description: on issues in epic list completed tasks should be marked the same way as on normal jira issue page green check

summary: change title from epic subtasks to issues in epic
description: as is now sorted title on issue dialog should be changed accordingly

description: investigate the problem reported by instance no

summary: subtasks rendering isn't always working

summary: rendering epics isn't working
description: we have to add rendering epics in the same way we do it now for stories
therefore json data need to be tweaked accordingly on the backed
it has to be done with respect of likely at the same time when decoded data is minified to save the space

summary: setting task's start dates with
description: every task should be draggable to make start date arrangement more convenient

summary: out of memory error when fetching many issues
description: it hapened twice so far in one case for instance with over issues
we should limit the data that are being fetched from jira api or limit the object size after json decoding
will involve some testing first

summary: chart sharing
description: it would be nice to have the ability to share the rendered chart with outside world via hashed link
one should be able to choose the filter used for rendering see and the result would be visible for the viewer via external link without any edit interaction allowed

summary: show issue's due date on chart
description: render as vertical bar red when task is overdue

summary: fetch issues from jira api in batches
description: if more issues that maxresults param can allow to fetch in one go we should perform another calls to the jira api once all issues are fetched
the limit is now hardcoded to but after implementing this feature it should be lowered to something around

summary: long names handling in left header
description: long project names should not overlap the assignee header
also too long or names rendered in left header should be cut and have added

summary: incorrect progress for completed tasks
description: when issue is resolved with estimate lower than original we should show progress as and time left should be empty

summary: allow filtering by version
description: when only one project selected user should have the ability to filter rendered tasks by version
similar to only root tasks in chain can be filtered out or these without dependencies
all filter choices need to be remembered with respect of

summary: allow filtering by component
description: when only one project selected user should have the ability to filter rendered tasks by component
only root tasks in chain can be filtered out or these without dependencies
if task belongs to some dependency chain that filtered out such task should be rendered diffrently greyed all filter choices need to be remembered with respect of

summary: show task's assigned person in left header
description: create separate column in left header and display assigned person name assignee there next to the name

summary: uncaught typeerror cannot read property avatarurls of null
description: clicking on the issue that has either assignee or reporter unassigned cause the js error

summary: data missing from instance table
description: i did noticed a few times that data strored in and columns had gone for almost all rows looks like some update command ran without proper where clause i think of any scenario that triggers that right now
need further investigation

summary: allow removing fixed start dates for issues
description: once the fixed start date is set for issue one should have the ability to remove it and rely back on automatic calculations

summary: circular references detection
description: in case of circulary linked issues detect such dependency loops and inform the user that rendering gantt chart may not be accurate
at the moment such cases just make js to crash too many stack

summary: go live
description: tell the world about this awesome well maybe not the whole world in the first place just atlassian

summary: create documentation manuals etc
description: to create a live listing on the atlassian marketplace need to be properly described all features explained etc

summary: add licensing support
description: before we can go live atlassian licensing model mst be supported
application need to handle the lic parameter in the requests and react accordingly

summary: allow setting start dates for issues
description: one should have the ability to define the start date not only for projects but also for individual issues as well
that will give the chance for better organizing the schedule view as blocks blocked by linking not always apply

summary: create backend model to instance plugin and user objects
description: create model dao and service backend classes representing instance jira installation plugin and user
all necessary data should be stored in database on plugin installation

it starts too high and the buttons are overlaping
also icons on the there buttons are missplaced

summary: fill in the issue dialog with all necessary data

summary: slack time support
description: for issues render a slack time line

summary: fix rendering of issues
description: when issue has parents from different branches it is rendered incorrectly on the first branch insted of that with the longest time scheduled

summary: support rendering issues without time estimates
description: issue that has no time estimates present should be still visible on the chart for example as diamond box with fixed width and color

summary: distinguish issues

summary: allow selecting projects
description: user need to be able to select the project for rendering
